website_summaries.verdict: This tea increases energy levels and helps you shed water, with natural ingredients like oolong wu yi, pomegranate, and ginger root.
pros: With organic oolong wu yi and organic green tea and EGCG
Cleanses while it boosts your metabolism and energy level
Helps get rid of excess water and reduces stress
Promotes a feeling of fullness and suppresses appetite while giving your body vitamins and  antioxidants
Use only one tea bag per day
cons: May notice some abdominal discomfort, although this may be the tea working

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Lost 7 pounds
customer_reviews.text: Lost 7 pound during the teatox and didn't really change my diet. I took this in the morning and it suppressed my appetite for a good while. I ate less with it and was able to lose a couple pounds. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: shoppingsavy

customer_reviews.title: First off let me say amazing!! I am not a tea drinker AT ...
customer_reviews.text: First off let me say amazing!! I am not a tea drinker AT ALL but I loved this tea! I drank mine cold and still got results. I am often times bloated and feel sluggish and this tea really helped my stomach to go down and gave me energy. I liked the fact that you only have to drink it once a day and I also like that it comes individually bagged. I would recommend this tea to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Katrise

customer_reviews.title: Caution: laxative
customer_reviews.text: This tea is amazing! It makes you feel lighter, less bloated and definitely flushes everything out of your system. However, this tea is definitely more of a laxative tea. If you are worried about going to the bathroom 2-3 times during the day, please be aware that this will probably not be the detox tea for you. However, the results are great. The scale may not drop, but you can definitely see the results in the mirror!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plus diet and exercise for best results
customer_reviews.text: In the interest of full disclosure, I have been using this teatox for only 5 days so far, and I was dieting and exercising prior to and while using it. That being said, I have lost 3 pounds to date in the 5 days since starting it. Prior to that, diet and exercise had allowed me to lose 15 pounds over the course of 7 weeks. I truly contribute my quickened weight loss to this tea, as my appetite has decreased and my energy has increased. I have yet to feel any negative side effects. I'm very pleased with this product and the results I have achieved.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Taste Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised that this tea actually taste good without adding any sweetener. I lost 4 pounds in a week and it definitely curved my appetite.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this unless you want a terrible stomach ache literally 10 minutes after you drink it
customer_reviews.text: HORRENDEOUS. Don't buy this unless you want a terrible stomach ache literally 10 minutes after you drink it. With or without food it's AWFUL.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Possible

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tea
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing, I don't feel bloated as much anymore and I feel like it's really helping me loose weight plus it tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Optimistic/time will tell! Update!
customer_reviews.text: Day one- smells and tastes pretty good good, almost a minty/lemon taste to me.. I'm looking forward to seeing how I feel on day 14! Iv never tried a tea detox so will update as I go. Day 6: I have definitely seen and can feel a difference, the scale says Iv lost 5lb.. I don't feel horrible bloated like I did before starting this tea detox! Very happy with it so far. Will update at day 14.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Good results so far. I've ordered twice and can honestly say that I feel less bloated and the tea does give you a boost of energy. Another plus is it doesn't have the laxative effect you find with most flat belly teas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the few teas I have actually liked. Recommended by a co-worker who has a tight ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the few teas I have actually liked. Recommended by a co-worker who has a tight stomach, so I had to try it! I would take it before going to the gym, and I would feel so much more energized (was it my imagination or the tea? idk). I have always suffered from bloating, and this tea really helped with that. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: jax

customer_reviews.title: BEST teatox ever!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!!!!! I have tried different teatox detoxes but this is by far my favorite. Not only does it taste amazing, but omg did the bloating go down drastically. It also definitely helped with digestion but not in a disgusting way like some of them do. I would drink this every single day if it didn't say that you should take a 3 month break after the 28 day one. BaeTea has definitely gained a lifelong customer. I cannot recommend this enough. Love love love! Just buy it already!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Funk

customer_reviews.title: Curves cravings
customer_reviews.text: I was super skeptical but it really has curved my appetite. Im only on day 4 but by day 2 I noticed I wasn’t mindlessly reaching for snacks. This is a good start to a healthy lifestyle. Update I am on day 10 now. I notice when I don’t drink my tea I snack and when I do my day goes by easier. I’ve started to drink it at night too as I notice my snacking peaks at night. Definetely reduced my puffiness. I’m a big tea drinker so I loved the flavor. Was worried it would be too sweet (stevia) but it was great
customer_reviews.author: Squirrelhoarder

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not so sure how this product received such great reviews with people losing weight and claiming their bloating has been reduced. I did read that this product issued many free trials for people to write positive reviews so perhaps that’s why. I have been using this product for over a week now and have not noticed anything different. The taste is like any other tea you can purchase for a few dollars at your local grocery store. I’m just trying to figure out why I paid so much for this product. I’m disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Did nothing for me. I followed the directions religiously and saw no difference in reduction of bloating or any other claims of this product. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: Not the best tasting and saw ZERO results after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: This tea doesn’t really taste good, I didn’t notice a difference in energy or do I feel detoxed lol. I drank this everyday for 2 weeks and saw zero changes in life, body or metabolism. On a positive note it didn’t make me poop my brains out (which is what I was scared of). 💩
customer_reviews.author: Future RN Court

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting tea, great results
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. I Love the taste and it works. The first few days I felt a little off, but during the beginning of the detox period I expected as much. I had introduced a product that was foreign to my body and was meant to purge all the negative effects inside of it. After that, however, I felt much lighter, better off, and healthier. I've lost a few pounds so far and am very happy with this product. I tend to be sensitive to caffeine but this tea doesn't upset my stomach which I absolutely love and it gives me the energy to help me get through my busy day.
customer_reviews.author: Crimson

customer_reviews.title: Just tasty tea...no "detox"
customer_reviews.text: The tea tastes good, quality packaging, doesn't need any sweeteners/ milk.... but... doesn't detox. Have been drinking it every evening for the entire 14 days and no change. I exercise daily and eat relatively healthy and nothing. Kind of disappointing as I have started a new workout/diet regimen and like to get a fresh start. Will have to find another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lolalove

customer_reviews.title: I like it just fine! 2nd time customer
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this tea. It surprisingly didn’t make me all poopy & it did not give me a upset stomach, head ache or anything. I mixed this with apple cider vinegar & lemon every single morning which I feel enhances the tea. My small belly blub has slimmed with little work out. Soothing to the throat during this pandemic. I just ordered some more & now that I know it’s good, I plan to work out more using it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ford

customer_reviews.title: Constipated me
customer_reviews.text: I tried this tea. I did the gull 14 Day Teatox.... it DID NOT WORK the Tea doesn't taste bad. At the bottom of the cup , you will get the tea trash, just don't drink that part. Shortly after drinking the tea, my stomach hurt ..I felt nauseous a few times, but nothing happened... sometimes a slight stomach ache for hours. The smell was terrible when I would use the bathroom. I actually got constipated while on this 14 day Teatox. 2 days after the final Teatox, my bowels worked normal again. I would not buy again, nor recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scoobyrogers

customer_reviews.title: I loved how much energy I got from this tea
customer_reviews.text: I loved how much energy I got from this tea. I used to drink coffee every morning before going to work. Once I have received this tea, I substituted my morning coffee for the tea and I noticed myself having the same amount of energy if not more. I actually like the taste of this tea as well. Love the freshness, the mix of the different herbs, and just the overall taste of it. Great product, can't wait to get my next one in the mail!!!. Thank you so much :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read more reviews about the taste before purchasing!
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all with the taste! I only tried it for one day and couldn't continue to do so, so I basically wasted my money!. This is a taste that I will never enjoy drinking. Perhaps is my fault and I should have read more reviews before purchasing! For those who say that the taste is ok or great, I don't really know what they mean.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Cale

customer_reviews.title: The detox tea was very good and the movie miracles from Heaven was excellent a ...
customer_reviews.text: The detox tea was very good and the movie miracles from Heaven was excellent a 30 star I took it to my Bible Study class for Movie Night everyone enjoyed it God Is Truly Amazing What A MIGHTY GOD WE SERVE.
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: Sadly not so happy side effects
customer_reviews.text: I'm on day 4 and I've been noticing an awful lot of gas and irritability. Yes I eat healthy and exercise. But I'm sadly not thrilled with this product. I think I'll go back to Flat Tummy Tea.
customer_reviews.author: aefarrz

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting tea curbs your appetite
customer_reviews.text: This tea is great. It does a good job at curbing my appetite for a while and I lost a couple of pounds without dieting. I love the taste; I don't sweeten it, but I never sweeten my tea. Too bad it's just one cup per day because I could drink this all day! Unfortunately, I don't have that boost of energy others have experienced but I will definitely continue using this tea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Day one, impressed
customer_reviews.text: Day one, first off tastes really good I don't drink tea and I like it so there's that. Second off after drinking it yesterday morning and going through all day yesterday I did frequent the bathroom not in a rush laxative way. And I found myself urinating very often as if my body was purging and Flushing as much liquid as it could and hopefully toxins which I believe is what it is designed to do. So with that being said day number one I'm impressed and looking forward to the rest
customer_reviews.author: black0311

customer_reviews.title: OMG!
customer_reviews.text: If you like crapping your brains out, this product is for you. How in the world can anyone get past day 2 all the way to day 14???!!!! Never again!
customer_reviews.author: Neilsqueen

customer_reviews.title: Worth A Try!
customer_reviews.text: This tea actually works! It made me feel great, and I lost 5-10 lbs in water weight in 2 weeks! I started tea and exercising 3 times a week I was able to keep the weight off. Will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: This was ok. I didn’t feel like it was a very strong detox tea. It doesnt have any laxative ingredients like senna so it kind of just made me pee, but only a little. The furst day, i went #2 like 4 times but after that, I don’t know if it was working or not. Didn’t seem very strong. Taste isnt bad, sometimes I added lemon for better taste.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: I really LOVE that this tea does NOT have senna in it
customer_reviews.text: A safe way to de-bloat! I really LOVE that this tea does NOT have senna in it. It is a healthy way to get rid of toxins in your body in a gentle and safe way.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanna R. Gerace

customer_reviews.title: Same as drinking water for me
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions to the letter. Morning with food for 14 days. Nothing happened. Nothing changed for me. Unlike many of the reviewers — I did not increase my workout activity or adjust my diet —- I wanted to see if this tea did what it claimed to do. Sorry — I could have drank water for 14 days and had the same affect. Can not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: paulachris

customer_reviews.title: Everything I ever wanted
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this stuff. I use it as often as possible. Along with diet and exercise I was able to lose 10lbs in a month. I order it every month. It helps with BM with the diet I'm on I eat high protein so it was hard for me to have BMs. I will continue to buy it and have my friends buying it now too
customer_reviews.author: Black Diamonds Detailer

customer_reviews.title: Hate the Taste
customer_reviews.text: I've had detox tea before and could drink it all day, but this one has a bad flavor in my opinion. It's not terrible, but I put a lot of sweetener in it and still had to force myself to drink it. I couldn't return it either, so I just wasted $14 on something I'll never use. If all you care about is detoxing and will do whatever it takes, I'd say give it a try. However, I'll pass on this brand and stick to the others with better taste
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Helps with bloating, tastes like regular tea.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well for me and I felt the effects almost immediately, within an hour or two after drinking it. The tea was fresh and had a typical 'tea' (earthy) taste. I was concerned about the reviews mentioning a bad taste. If you drink herbal green or black tea regularly you shouldn't have an issue with the taste of this product. It helped me to get rid of bloating prior to my wedding. I did purchase another brand of detox tea and tried it as well, but it did not have the same effect. I would order this tea again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda DeShazo

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never written a review before but disliked this tea so much I wanted to write a review. The taste was ok the first few days but by day 4 I was having to choke it down because of the smell. I drink tea on a daily basis (Earl Grey) but am not a fan of herbal teas. I wanted to try this for the detox benefits and to help with bloating. I have not felt any different, it has done NOTHING; no appetite suppressant, no extra energy and feeling of wellbeing, no weight loss, NOTHING. I got more out of my daily probiotic as far as digestion.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Myers

customer_reviews.title: taste not bad
customer_reviews.text: I am asain and I always drink herb tea.I love to have stronger tea.the first day I take this tea I run restrooms twice (usually I go once a day)but my second day back to normal.now it’s the second weeks already.I did lose some weight but I am not too sure it from this tea.but the taste is ok to me.
customer_reviews.author: YanniXian

customer_reviews.title: Day 1
customer_reviews.text: Just received this in the mail today. So Day 1 start today 6/10/2020 . Taste is not bad didn’t add anything to the tea.. will update after my 14days are up. To see if it really works. If you have any questions please comment . Not going to hold anything thing back. I decided to use this product instead of Nutraburst & etc... that everyone is using. I’ve Read many reviews on this one & others that I’ve also looked into trying but went with this one here. I’ve seen pictures of different body types & everyone’s review & hopefully after my 14 days are up I will feel great for using this Product & making the right choice
customer_reviews.author: Michelle v.

customer_reviews.title: Kills constant hunger
customer_reviews.text: This is my first day so for now 3 stars until I’ve finished the detox, I will come back with an update but so far I’ve finished the first day and it taste rather bitter but if you regularly drink tea this should be no problem and may even find it a tad sweet. my appetite is definitely doing better than it would be without having drank the tea and I haven’t had any trips to the restroom so that is great because those two things I was worried about most when doing a detox tea. I will come back after 14 days and give an update on results !
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Perez

customer_reviews.title: A good cleanse
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my coffee with this. I didn't see weight loss, but I wasn't really using it for that. It works well as an internal cleanse without the harshness. Tastes really good! So far I've ordered two. I plan to order more next month.
customer_reviews.author: madiG

customer_reviews.title: I used this for the whole two weeks and have felt worse since I stopped drinking this
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I thought this product was well worth it. I've tried other teatoxes and didn't get the same results. This actually helped reduced much of the bloating I constantly face. It's even given me energy in the mornings in lieu of extra sugar from coffee. I used this for the whole two weeks and have felt worse since I stopped drinking this.
customer_reviews.author: Jem

customer_reviews.title: Good tea saw results
customer_reviews.text: So today was my last day and I can see the results I didn't exercise as much but did eat better. I love herbal tea so the taste was ok not sweet a lil bitter but ok I wasn't as hungry as usual either after breakfast i wouldn't be hungry till dinner. bloating went down as well and lost 5 pounds not alot but i will order again and this time with working out should see better results.
customer_reviews.author: Shay Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Bad box?
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I got a defective box... but I've made two bags and both has the same result. Tea/ingredient particles come out of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mandee H

customer_reviews.title: Finally a teatox I ENJOY
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely LOVING this tea! I started about 6 days ago and my energy levels have been out of this world. I started it to help kickstart me on my new Keto diet and help me kick my unhealthy sweet tooth habits, and it has NOT disappointed. If you are comparing this with other teatoxes, such as Skinny Mint, I actually love this better: the price, the flavor, and the energy boost! Best thing is, it doesn’t effect my digestive tract. Other teatoxes leave me with an upset stomach, but it’s so subtle that all you feel is increased energy.
customer_reviews.author: Angie O

customer_reviews.title: I feel terrible
customer_reviews.text: After 4 days I waited and waited for this to work for me. I didn't expect to lose weight right away but I did expect to feel good. Waited to have the need to go to the bathroom often like others have said but the total opposite happened. I was so bloated and constipated from drinking this!!! No extra energy, nothing but feeling terrible! I had to stop drinking it and throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Becky L

customer_reviews.title: Super shocked!
customer_reviews.text: I have only drank this tea for about four days so far, mind you- with healthy eating- it is amazing! My pants already feel a bit looser. I did notice that it makes me go to the bathroom quite often but I’m overly happy because before this tea, my bowel movements were irregular. I’m excited to see the results after the 14 days is up! & will post another review after that. The taste isn’t bad either. Tastes super fresh and I also do not add any sweetener to it at all, I just drink it straight. Only negative thing would be for the first few days I did get some stomach cramps but other than that, I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Noble

customer_reviews.title: Everyone's different, but I wont buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to try this when I saw that people were so in love with it and it had good reviews. This tastes 100% better IMO than the Fit Tea which I've used but I guess taste doesn't matter because I saw and felt zero results from this tea. Fit Tea may taste terrible to me, but it really helped quick out the water weight and prevent me from bloating to where I could see my abs everyday without flexing. Think I'll go back to Fit tea if I want a real detox.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Taste good!
customer_reviews.text: Received me tea 2 days ago. I haven't gotten through the 14 days yet so I'll update when i am. But in the mean time I do love the taste it has a little spice ting to it. My husband loves the taste too. I wish I could drink more then one cup a day. Also the little tea bags are super cute, kind of fancy looking. Looking forward to seeing the results and trying the other teas.
customer_reviews.author: SHAWNA DITCH

customer_reviews.title: Tastes pretty good and wakes me up!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t report yet if it has helped to lose weight, but I find the tea very pleasant and somewhat energizing. The flavor was iffy on the first day, but I’ve now come to enjoy it! I drink it first thing in the morning and I like to think that even if the tea itself isn’t aiding my weight loss, it is helping to wake up my mind for the day!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Purchased twice now!
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered my second order about a year apart. The first time I had it, the tea wasn’t terrible as the other detox teas I’d had. This one is totally mild in taste and I even fill my cup with water keeping used bag when I’m done with the tea. No crazy bathroom after-effect and still reduces my bloating and helps you get back on track. I’d forgotten that it worked great the first time around and I’m glad I could still buy it online.
customer_reviews.author: Melina

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Love this tea. I was unsure when I ordered. I always feel like I'm over full after eating but have not since I started drinking this tea. I'm on day 4 and my overall body FEELS BETTER, my skin looks great, my mood seems better and I sleep more sound!! My husband has even noticed. I have not weighed because this was not purchased for weight loss but to ease my stomach issue, but can tell a little difference in my clothes...maybe because I feel so much better :)
customer_reviews.author: Christie H.

customer_reviews.title: Helps so much!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this teatox. I lost about 2 lbs but I was also exercising and eating better. The tea does make you “go” but, it’s not like a laxative and not constant. It gave me a good amount of energy for working out without getting jittery which was amazing. Usually I get jittery off of things like this. It also improved my mood. While drinking the tea, my mood would boost. This is a really good product and I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect but saw the good reviews so I took the chance and bought it. It suppressed my appetite so much that I was never hungry for lunch. If I do eat lunch I'm satisfied with less food. It also didn't give me a stomach ache which I initially thought I would get. I can't say I lost weight on it because I don't eat as healthy as I should but It would help if you actuallly tried. I think if I took it longer and ate healthy I woul without a problem because of the appetite suppression.
customer_reviews.author: ZS

customer_reviews.title: If you want to drop 10 lbs in 2 weeks...?
customer_reviews.text: Want to loose 10 pounds??? This is your solution. Don’t buy the other teas that claim the same thing. Take it from me, i bought them all! This works, just purchased 4 bags. Must eat something before taking, very rough on tummy if you don’t. Eat anything, a cracker or a bite of something, doesn’t take much and you won’t want anything.
customer_reviews.author: KelleyBelly

customer_reviews.title: I am on day four and I feel great. My stomach feels amazing and it looks flatter
customer_reviews.text: I gave baetea a four star rating because I haven't completed the 14 days yet. But! I am on day four and I feel great. My stomach feels amazing and it looks flatter! I'm excited to see what I will feel and look like on day 15 when I've completed the 14 days!!! I also like the taste of the tea. I used to drink three cups of coffee in the morning, now after using baetea I'm down to half a cup...that's amazing in and of itself!
customer_reviews.author: MusicAndBooks

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tea
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the detox purposes and the energy boost this tea describes. So often I expect products like this to not live up to the hype, but have been pleasantly pleased to find that the hype and reviews were TRUE!. I have lost 5 lbs, I noticed that I have more energy and my stomach is not as bloated. The pleasant taste of the tea makes me want to drink this tea, however I do suggest you drink the tea hot and not on an empty stomach. I did get a little nauseated when I forgot to eat first.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I started drinking this tea didn’t taste bad but put a little honey in it
customer_reviews.text: I started drinking this tea didn’t taste bad but put a little honey in it. After finishing the tea I realized that I’ve lost some weight my jeans started falling off. My daughter saw the weight loss and comment on that also said it looked good on me. Thank you Baetea, will get more
customer_reviews.author: ANG

customer_reviews.title: but this one is truly amazing! Despite some reviews
customer_reviews.text: I'm always skeptical about detoxes, but this one is truly amazing! Despite some reviews, it tastes very good! It's really herbal, like something natural and home made. I do add some honey cause I find it bitter. But the first day I drank it, I immedtly felt less bloated after eating! I even had a cheese omelet, no bloating! It does make you have to go to the bathroom, but only after your first cup. Love!!
customer_reviews.author: josie damon

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t notice anything different drinking this over just drinking regular water. Waste of money in my opinion. Wouldn’t buy again. Was excited to try it when I first received it and was sadly disappointed after I did.
customer_reviews.author: bubblekisses

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: It did not work. Do not waste your money on these things bc I'm order for these things to work if there's that possiblity, one has to go on a strict dies if you want to see good results. But to go on a strict diet, you will eventually be seeing results but then the product gets all the credit which is just over rated.
customer_reviews.author: Tamanna

customer_reviews.title: Wont work on everyone??
customer_reviews.text: I like the tea bag it comes in but other then that not working what so ever on me my husband tried it and said it was like a laxative feel lol but as for me hasn’t done anything at all
customer_reviews.author: Angela Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: I have waited until the last few days before writing this review, I haven’t noticed any changes as far as bloating or weight loss except for the daily headaches. I was prepared for side effects but with exercise and diet change I thought I would have seen a change. All this experience was is an expensive daily cup of tea. I have used other teas and I did see a change but not this one.
customer_reviews.author: celina leal

customer_reviews.title: This tea is fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love this tea! I drank it in the morning in exchange for my morning cup of coffee. It tastes wonderful, kind of floral. Adding sweeteners made it too sweet for me, so I just drank it plain. It helped with bloating better than anything I have ever used. After 2 weeks, I was down 8 pounds, and I felt phenomenal. I'm on the 28 day cleanse at the moment, and it's also amazing. Will review once I've finished! Highly recommend this tea!!
customer_reviews.author: Errinn Voorhies

customer_reviews.title: Did not meet expectations
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it would work if you were doing an overall diet shift at the same time as starting to use this product. I was already following a lower carbohydrate diet, not a lot of processed foods, and minimal diet soda, so I saw no effects. No weight loss or bloating reduction. I would not buy again. The taste was fine, but I can buy similar products for less than half of the cost of this for double the supply.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna May

customer_reviews.title: Love this Product
customer_reviews.text: This product smells amazing! I love the flavor it taste like honey so it's great for me to enjoy with my morning meal. This is my third time ordering the tea so i am finally leaving a review. I recently had a baby and used this product 9 weeks post partum. After 9 days my skin was glowing, my stomach was flatter, and I felt better. This product removes bloat if you eat a clean diet with the product. It is a slow detox so your not gonna have a day with a upset stomach. WOMEN! Your reproductive area will smell well amazing after using this product. I also had a shorter period without any cramps after drinking this tea.
customer_reviews.author: savona sadler

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, amazing product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: This Teatox was amazing. I was skeptical at first, as I am sure many people were, and I was deciding between many products, but I am very glad I chose BaeTea. Ive recently gotten off track with my fitness and I wanted something to press the reset button on my bad eating. This tea made me feel so much less bloated and I have definitely noticed changes around my midsection. Another thing I really loved about the tea is the taste. The bloating was the main reason I wanted this product and it exceeded expectations, very happy I chose this and will for sure be purchasing again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Covington

customer_reviews.title: Too Good To Be True
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical before I purchased this tea. I’ve seen all kinds of ads for “Skinny Teas” and always thought it was too good to be true. I finished the 14 days last week and it definitely made me feel less bloated and I noticed my stomach seemed flatter. I also noticed my cravings for junk subsided while I was drinking the tea. The taste isn’t the greatest but it’s not terrible. I will definitely be repurchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Robertson

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! I originally was looking for skinny mint tea ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I originally was looking for skinny mint tea and came across this and it was was less! I can't compare the two but so far this tea has been good. I haven't lost a substantial amount of weight, I've only been on it for a little over a week but I occasionally have get stopped up (constipated) and I have been very regular, even two times a day along with feeling less bloated so I guess that's a win! I'd like to do it for 28 days and see if I notIce other positive changes. Oh I have noticed I do have a little more energy in the mornings as well! 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Good tea to augment diet/exercise
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Tastes great (it's a tad spicy but I love spicy), it is safe- all ingredients seem legit, it WILL help you have awesome bms 1-3xs a day, it's a great way to start your day/work out (energizes w/o making you jittery), I was less lethargic through out the day, it facilitates weight loss w/ diet and exercise- I lost about 3 lbs in 14 days Cons: It is pricy and it's not a miracle weight loss tea- you still gotta work it! It just greases the gears:)
customer_reviews.author: Navster

customer_reviews.title: I love this tea
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea, really does help detox and makes you feel less bloated I drink it everyday and am losing water weight and feel great, I'm a tea drinker without anything added and this tea for me tastes great!! Love it
customer_reviews.author: moriah young

customer_reviews.title: Did weird things to my body!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product for the first time today. The taste is ok but the tea gave me a burning sensation in my head and chest. Almost like heartburn but much much worse. It did suppress my appetite but made me so thirsty all day long which means I’m flushing out of my body all of the caffeine that is in the tea. Idk if my body just needs to get used to or what but I don’t think I’ll be using it again....scares me too much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: don't feel the difference. not worthy.
customer_reviews.text: I am a tea person. When I read the ingredients, I thought it looked worthy as I have experience on those herbs and other kind teas. I am just disappointed about the results though. Firstly the quantity is not that good. Just 14 tea bags there. Secondly I don't feel any difference before and after using it. not working for me.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: After reading a bunch of reviews for different 'tea-detox' options, I gave this one a try. The tea doesn't taste bad, it doesn't taste great either. After 14 days, there wasn't any noticeable change with my energy/metabolism, shrinking or even cleansing of the stomach, or reduction with the bloat I often experience around that time of the month - the only side effect I had was slight constipation! I just wonder if it takes more than 14 days of this? (Some of the reviews had folks saying a difference was noticeable after a few days...)
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Very bitter with a weird mint flavor. I did not notice anything different when drinking. I have had better results changing my diet but was wanting to see if this tea would speed up the results. For some odd reason after drinking I felt woozy quite a few times. Took It for about a week.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER

customer_reviews.title: I really liked the energy this tea gave me
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the energy this tea gave me. And for everyone who complained about the flavor? They must not be tea drinkers. I thought it was really pleasant and didn't taste much different then most teas.
customer_reviews.author: Kami Hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: Great tea!
customer_reviews.text: This tea was great to help me in my weight loss journey. The tea tasted really good with some honey in it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Calderon

customer_reviews.title: Taste good and feel great
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Tea after trying Fit Tea from a brick and mortar store. I looked extensively at online reviews and chose this Tea because of the great ratings. I have to agree that the tea works! I had reduced hunger cravings and felt less bloated than I had in months! I did not feel the urge to go to the bathroom which is a bonus because of the inconvenience of time! The taste is pleasant and it is safe and easy! Works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Pj1391

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Delicious
customer_reviews.text: The Baetea 14 day Teatox Detox is awesome. It tastes amazing, I did not need to add anything to enhance or dilute the actual taste. Very refreshing and it began flushing out the toxins within the first 24 hours. I never felt fatigued or off like some of the other reviews. I definitely would recommend to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy L.

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: I’d seen a few celebrities advertise this tea and finally tried it. After day 5 I’m pleasantly surprised. I’ve not had any significant weight loss, but I do look and feel less bloated, and it’s been effective at suppressing my appetite, too! The tea also tastes pretty good— slightly lemony and not overly sweet. If you do like really sweet drinks, I’d add a little extra stevia. I was also afraid it would be hard in my sensitive stomach, but it’s actually been great. All in all, I’m happy with my purchase and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bear

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I gave this tea only 3 stars because it does not do what other detox teas have done for me. The taste is pleasant and it does not contain Senna, which means there's not awful stomach cramping. However, it does not give me any "detox" qualities. I feel that I should have just kept my money and continued using a detox tea I bought at my local grocery store which cost a lot less than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Never had more energy
customer_reviews.text: Didn't expect results this amazing from a simple tea. From the first day on, I felt better, lighter, more energized. After a few days, I was more regular, less bloated. Not your typical detox where you can't stay away from the bathroom. I go about my day, drink my tea, feel great. I've re-purchased this product several times now, and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Black teeth!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product to promote weight loss...we ended up with two trips to the dentist to un-black our teeth! This product turned our teeth the color of burned motor oil! I am not sure if the weight loss thing worked but I am certain you should only buy this product if it will accentuate your ghoulish Halloween costume or your home is devoid of mirrors.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Lewis

customer_reviews.title: I could tell a difference after one use.
customer_reviews.text: This may sound unreal, but this tea actually did give me energy and made me feel good after one use. I held off for weeks before I opened it. I wasn’t sure because the detox word kind of made me nervous. I was nervous it was going to taste bad. I was nervous I wasted my money. I was nervous it was going to make me feel weird. I was wrong. It’s actually refreshIng, smells and tastes nice. . Can’t wait to see / feel results after 14 days.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Houck

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and branding!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I absolutely love this product! I'm not one to usually write reviews and prior to purchasing I spent a lot of time researching the best teatox's on the market this year and narrowed it down to a few before I chose to go with this one. Not only is the product amazing and effective but it makes you feel like you're starting the day off right and it tastes great! Also, being a graphic designer I look at packaging and branding which also directs my puchasing decisions to an extent and I must say, I love the branding and the packaging seems like they invest in their product greatly, which normally means they also believe in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how this is supposed to work but I've been drinking the tea 10 days straight. I did excercise but nothing changed. Only one day I went to the bathroom three times back to back other than that it didn't do anything for me.
customer_reviews.author: Laura T

customer_reviews.title: No results.. No nothing
customer_reviews.text: What was this supposed to do again??? I'm on day 7 and not seeing, feeling, experiencing anything. I feel like I'm just drinking a cup of reg hot tea with my breakfast. No change in bowels, stomach or appetite. Seeing a waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Corona

customer_reviews.title: Maybe lost 2 pounds. I was watching calories, ...
customer_reviews.text: Maybe lost 2 pounds. I was watching calories, eating healthy and excercising. Hard to say what attributed to the results, but can say I didn't lose much.
customer_reviews.author: bkwashpa

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great, didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.text: This product is nicely packaged, tastes great, and is fresh. However, it did not work for me. I was hoping to jump start a 10 pound weight loss. I am unfortunately more bloated and “irregular” now on day 8. I plan on finishing it out just in case. And it really is good tea. I’m not upset with the product or the company, just wanted to leave my honest opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Willis

customer_reviews.title: Definitely eliminates bloat!
customer_reviews.text: I am on day 4 and didn’t think anything was happening until I put my jeans on this morning and they were noticeably less snug around the waistband. It is definitely elimating bloat already. All I’ve changed is no carbs and no sugar and more water. Will be exercising the remainder of my ten days and will update this review with results. To me the taste is neutral. Not sweet but not bitter. Also, so far I haven’t experienced any of the side effects. I eat immediately after drinking
customer_reviews.author: Candra

customer_reviews.title: Surprize !
customer_reviews.text: Good Stuff ! First I was really surprised, due to the fact I don't do not no way, like herbal teas but the baetea 'teatox' had a very pleasant taste. I do find that my energy level is up but still chubby :) Flavor and the energy is why I ordered a second bag of baetea.
customer_reviews.author: Geo G

customer_reviews.title: I loved the taste of this tea
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I loved the taste of this tea! I would drink it just for that. It didn’t need anything added to it, just steep and drink. I bought it after having some kydney stone issues and thought it might help flush anything else remaining. Not sure if it did or didn’t but I felt much better after beginning my teatox. I drank a cup every morning and besides feeling lighter, I seemed to have more energy and less cravings. I ordered my next bag after going without it for two days. I didn’t have ANY negative side effects with this tea.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: This tea does *nothing* and tastes bad
customer_reviews.text: I've completed the two weeks on the tea. I made this purchase impulsively, during a moment of insecurity. It tastes awful, honestly and did absolutely nothing. I mean, not even a laxative or diuretic effect. There are cheaper, better tasting teas with quality ORGANIC ingredients that are time tested detoxifying effects. Save your money, stick to the detox tea at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme Perrine

customer_reviews.title: (1) The fact that they suggest you eat while drinking the tea is wonderful. (2) The tea is tasty
customer_reviews.text: I am just a few days into this 14-day detox. First impressions a few days in: (1) The fact that they suggest you eat while drinking the tea is wonderful. (2) The tea is tasty, (3) You won't see/feel anything the first day or so, but as you consume it, you'll feel less bloated, your system will move along more efficiently, and there are no odd side effects. I am eager to see where the full 2 weeks takes me, but I'm inclined to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A. Manna

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a day-starter beverage
customer_reviews.text: It's a delicious blend of teas that helps me wake up in the morning and start my day energized. One teabag makes a strong morning brew and a weaker (but still delicious) one for the travel mug to take to work. For someone like me, who can't have coffee or black tea, it's a great option. No weight loss detected, unfortunately, even if combined with dieting, but that's just one individual case and 14 days might simply not be enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow! This really works
customer_reviews.text: I'm not usually one to buy products like this is I feel that they are mostly hype with a little to no results. I am purchasing this product again as I lost 6 pounds doing only the 14 day program. I can only imagine LOL I will do if I continue to use this product and exercise properly
customer_reviews.author: Wes Wingo

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the taste of the tea. It did not work instantly, but I changed my diet and eating habits around. I believe if you eat healthy and drink the tea, it works effectively. If not, you will not see the results you are looking for. I am almost near the end of the 14 day pack and feel less bloated and lighter in the stomach area. I would buy this product again for sure
customer_reviews.author: Megan Creech

customer_reviews.title: Big MEH
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I retained water and was constipated the whole time I drank this tea. I gained about 3 lbs of water weight drinking this. The tea itself didn’t taste awful, but there are tastier teas if the detox properties don’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: I have tried everything... so I was doubtful...
customer_reviews.text: This worked really well for me. I wish I could take it every day! I actually felt much better about 5 days in. Give it some time, and remember everyone's body is different. But if you suffer from hormonal bloating and stomach discomfort, this will at least help move things along in your body and keep you from feeling like a balloon all the time. Really thankful I tried this, I am definitely going to take it with me on a trip abroad this summer just to relieve any travel discomforts!
customer_reviews.author: sophie

customer_reviews.title: the product works great!
customer_reviews.text: The product works really well. It did made me feel less bloated and my appetite has lessen. The only reason that I did not give it 5 stars is because of the taste. It is something that you have to get use to I guess to continue drinking it. Other than that, the product would have been perfect for me. But I love that it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i love the tea very much and i can feel my ...
customer_reviews.text: i love the tea very much and i can feel my waistline getting smaller after 4days.the tea smells very good and the taste is not bad at all. i added tsp of honey on it. im so excited to receive my free tea in the mail. thanks for helping out women who cant exercise because of health reasons but likes to lose some inches on their waistline. i did change my eating habits too because im determined to make a difference😍😀😍
customer_reviews.author: janet niniel

customer_reviews.title: the tea is great, it tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I had started the teatox, my appetite went down. I ate smaller portions instead of big portions. However, one downfall is that my weight is still the same. I think weight loss depends on how hard you are willing to work for it. For me I drank the tea for 14 days, and felt rejuvenated, but I did not workout as often. Overall, the tea is great, it tastes great, and I don't eat as much anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm about this life!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first, but this tea is very revitalizing! I am normally very sluggish before a work out (keep in mind I drink this in the morning), but even by 9pm, I still have the will power and energy to workout! Regardless if it's a placebo effect or the tea itself working, I love this stuff! The taste is good, like a normal lemon tea, definitely not hard to drink. I have only been teatoxing for a week, and I've already recommended this to my friends and co-workers. Even when I'm done, I think I would definitely keep drinking this! Good job Baetea! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Baetea 14-Day Teatox Herbal Detox Tea Supplement with Green Tea & Ginger Root, 14 Tea Bags
feature_bullets: GENTLE DETOX & CLEANSE: Our smooth-tasting 14-Day Teatox helps cleanse & purify the body. It helps boost your metabolism & energy level while helping get rid of excess water & reducing stress.
NATURAL APPETITE SUPPRESSANT: Packed with the superfood nutrients of green tea, ginger root & more, this tea aids digestion to help relieve excessive bloating & naturally suppressing your appetite.
TRY THEM ALL: Try our entire selection of sleep teas, energy teas & detox teas for the best in natural ingredients including traditional organic herbs, natural extracts & superfood nutrients!
BOOST ENERGY: Our teas contain natural ingredients to promote a feeling of fullness, help suppress appetite or aid in relaxation while giving you nutrition.
BAETEA HEALTH & LIFESTYLE: We're a health & lifestyle company with a desire to promote an active, healthy & balanced lifestyle. We want you to look & feel fabulous & full of energy!
